definition: year of one's birth sign, according to the cycle of 12 animals of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: In particular, next year is my personal year, which would surely be more difficult this year .
sentences.chinese: 尤其明年是我個人的本命年，肯定會比今年更辛苦。

sentences.english: When it"s your year, it is believed you are going to get more bad luck."
sentences.chinese: 到了本命年，人們認爲會更容易倒黴。

sentences.english: This year is my year of fate.
Chinese people say that every 12 years is an animal year .
sentences.chinese: 中國人說每12年是一個本命年。
你問別人的本命年是哪一年。

definition: Tai Sui, God of the year/archaic name for the planet Jupiter 木星[Mu4 xing1]/nickname for sb who is the most powerful in an area
colloquial term for 生肖[sheng1 xiao4] the animals associated with the years of a 12-year cycle
to have luck with the ladies (idiom)
one of the twelve animals symbolic of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]/animal from the Chinese zodiac
